data.title: Hearst Communications Customer Service Phone Number (212) 586
data.meta_description: How to contact Hearst Communications customer support at general info phone number? Call or write an email to resolve Hearst Communications issues: Activation/ Cancellation, Payments and Charges, Account. Visit the company website www.hearst.com or help center for more information.
data.text:
I made a payment , which was not accounted for. I made a second payment , via Visa , which was not accounted for.

My 14 emails were ignored , customer service is horrible!

They dont read your request , but simply send you an automatic reply!

After paying for 19 years a RED subscription, I am walking away!

Who needs this kind of nonsense ?!

Incompetence has reached an all time high in the UK HEARST office.

RED.Shame on you!

I ordered and paid for the Prevention Calendar, once, in 2022, for a christmas gift to a family member. Next thing I know, I get another Prevention Calendar in the mail sometime around 09/2023, that I definitely did not order.

The problem with this company is they are doing business under several different names. I tried to look up how to return the mess, couldn't locate an address or customer service email or phone number for Prevention Magazine. Can't even find an account number on any website that I set up where I can find proof of things I did or did not order. I was forwarded to Hearst media.

Their return policy is *** poor. States that customers have to pay postage to return merchandise they send you unsolicited. I finally put the package in the US post office box marker :Return To Sender-Not For this address.

I am certainly not paying return postage for Hearst Media's foul up. Now they are harassing me by mail, threatening to ruin my credit if I don't pay for the book AND the price keeps going up every time I get one of these letters in the mail.
